entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, 4.5°C

Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 99 %

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Fog patches. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 20 early this morning then light near noon. High 10. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight then partly cloudy. Fog patches dissipating after midnight. Wind becoming west 20 km/h after midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High 7 except plus 3 inland. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High 7 except plus 3 inland. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Saturday 18 March 2023
